text: bhala kya wajeh hai ke tum Allah ki raah mein aur un na-tawaa mardu,aurto aur nanne nanne baccho ke chutkaare ke liye jihaad na karo? jo yo duae maang rahe hai ke aye hamaare parvardigaar! un zaalimo ki basti se hamein najaath de aur hamaare liye khud apne paas se himaayati muqarrar karde aur hamaare liye qaas apne paas se madadgaar bana
